name: Snapdragon (sarn, vaalentines, Duckonaut, Oroshibu)
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z: Your next move will be a dash, allowing you to stretch great distances during a single turn.
  • X: Swap the positions of your head and tail.
  • C: Restore your body to its minimum length.
  • V: Activate your item, if you have one.

A game by:

  • sarn: Programming
  • duckonaut: Programming
  • valentines: Art
  • Oroshibu: Music & SFX

Special thanks:

  • Viktor Kraus

This game was created for the 7DRL Challenge 2023, but we ended up making the game in like 2 days instead and ended up scoping back quite a bit.

The soundtrack can be found here.
